title: 3 and Out - Remembering John Madden, CFP Semis Preview (**Bama Upset Alert***)
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Remembering John Madden, CFP Semis Preview (**Bama Upset Alert***)
description:
John remembers the life and immeasurable impact of the legendary John Madden on the NFL and popular culture. Then, he previews the CFP semifinals and explains why Bama should be on upset alert against Cincinnati, and why Harbaugh and Michigan can bludgeon their way past Georgia in the other semi.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
